statements: SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_records ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_cost FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE vehicle_id = 1
SELECT mechanic_name FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_cost > 500
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_type LIKE 'Oil%'
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_records ORDER BY mechanic_name ASC, maintenance_date DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_records ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC, maintenance_cost ASC
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_cost FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change'
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_type, mechanic_name FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE mechanic_name LIKE '%Smith%'
SELECT maintenance_date, maintenance_type, SUM(maintenance_cost) AS total_cost FROM vehicle_maintenance_records GROUP BY maintenance_date, maintenance_type HAVING total_cost > 500
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM VehicleMaintenanceRecords;
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_date FROM VehicleMaintenanceRecords WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT maintenance_description FROM VehicleMaintenanceRecords WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceExpenses ORDER BY expense_amount DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT vehicle_id FROM VehicleMaintenanceRecords ORDER BY vehicle_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM VehicleMaintenanceRecords WHERE vehicle_id = 123
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_date FROM VehicleMaintenanceRecords WHERE maintenance_description LIKE '%oil change%'
SELECT vehicle_id, expense_amount FROM MaintenanceExpenses WHERE expense_amount > 1000 ORDER BY expense_amount DESC
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_description FROM VehicleMaintenanceRecords WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT vehicle_id, COUNT(*) AS total_maintenance FROM VehicleMaintenanceRecords GROUP BY vehicle_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT id, make, model FROM vehicles WHERE year > 2015;
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_date, cost FROM vehicle_maintenance_records ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT type_name, description FROM maintenance_types WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE cost > 1000;
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE year >= 2018 ORDER BY make ASC, model DESC;
SELECT id, make, model,year FROM vehicles WHERE make = 'Toyota' AND year > 2015 AND NOT (model = 'Camry') ORDER BY year ASC;

SELECT v.make, v.model, v.year, COUNT(*) AS vehicle_count FROM vehicles v INNER JOIN vehicle_maintenance_records vmr ON v.id = vmr.vehicle_id GROUP BY v.make, v.model, v.year HAVING COUNT(*) > 3 ORDER BY vehicle_count DESC;

SELECT v.make, v.model, mt.type_name, vmr.maintenance_date FROM vehicles v INNER JOIN vehicle_maintenance_records vmr ON v.id = vmr.vehicle_id INNER JOIN maintenance_types mt ON vmr.maintenance_type = mt.type_name WHERE vmr.cost > 500 ORDER BY v.make ASC, v.model ASC, vmr.maintenance_date DESC;

SELECT v.make, v.model, mt.description FROM vehicles v INNER JOIN vehicle_maintenance_records vmr ON v.id = vmr.vehicle_id INNER JOIN maintenance_types mt ON vmr.maintenance_type = mt.type_name WHERE vmr.maintenance_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY v.make ASC, v.model ASC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle WHERE make = 'Toyota';
SELECT model, year FROM vehicle WHERE year > 2015 ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT make, model FROM vehicle WHERE make LIKE 'H%' ORDER BY make ASC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle WHERE year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020 ORDER BY year ASC, make DESC;
SELECT id, make, model FROM vehicle WHERE make = 'Honda' OR make = 'Ford' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT make, model, year FROM vehicle WHERE year > 2015;
SELECT DISTINCT make FROM vehicle WHERE make LIKE 'C%' ORDER BY make ASC;

SELECT vehicle.make, mechanic.name FROM vehicle JOIN maintenance_history ON vehicle.id = maintenance_history.vehicle_id JOIN mechanic ON maintenance_history.mechanic_id = mechanic.id WHERE mechanic.experience_years > 5;
SELECT vehicle.make, maintenance.maintenance_type, maintenance.maintenance_date FROM vehicle JOIN maintenance ON vehicle.id = maintenance.vehicle_id WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT vehicle.make AS car_make, COUNT(maintenance.id) AS maintenance_count FROM vehicle LEFT JOIN maintenance ON vehicle.id = maintenance.vehicle_id GROUP BY car_make HAVING COUNT(maintenance.id) > 0 ORDER BY maintenance_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_name, manufacturing_date FROM vehicles ORDER BY manufacturing_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM mechanics WHERE specialization = 'Engine';
SELECT vehicle_name, maintenance_date, description FROM maintenance_records WHERE vehicle_id = 3;
SELECT part_name, manufacturer, quantity FROM spare_parts WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_name, vehicle_type, manufacturing_date FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'Car';
SELECT v.vehicle_name, m.maintenance_date, m.description FROM vehicles v JOIN maintenance_records m ON v.vehicle_id = m.vehicle_id;
SELECT mechanic_id, first_name, last_name FROM mechanics ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT s.part_name, s.manufacturer, s.quantity FROM spare_parts s WHERE quantity > 10;
